She didn't realized in the moment that you guys turned into mist while she was in the corner.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's all right. I've had worse.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm pretty sure she has another 5th-level spell, and this would be the last of them. She's going to go ahead and Flame Strike again on the frost worm. This time centering it around there, so the ten-foot radius only hits the worm and doesn't see any allies nearby. So that will be 8d6. 33 points of damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Go, Pike!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural 20 on the save, though, so it takes half the damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Damn you! Dick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hopefully that's enough. And that finishes her turn. Back to the top: Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you hold your action?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I held my action

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Until when?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Until the other worm returns.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll do the same thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The frost worm, it's now its turn. It does not get its frost breath. However--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's a rock slide to its right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is! There is a rock slide. That Keyleth is standing in. Thank you for the reminder.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Damn it! Sorry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thanks for that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to turn around. You can see now, its tail emerges, and it's going to arc up and try and bite and slam in your direction with both sides of its body at once. This tail does not have a stinger on it, but it is still a giant bludgeoning implement. First attack is going to be a 19 to hit?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Next one is going to be a 16 to hit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, it does bite down with its open, icy jaws. You take 17 points of piercing damage, as well as an additional six points of cold damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bringing it to a total of 22?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I deserved that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We live in a cold, cold world. No one deserves anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let's see if it makes any sort of perception check. Okay, cool. That ends its turn. It's now Keyleth's turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So does it know that I'm there since it just took a big chunk out of me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It senses that it impacted something and something that reacted and tasted like it had been bitten, so you get the sense that it knows you're there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. I'm in arm's length of it, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to reach out and cast Blight on it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You touch me when you're trying to touch the worm. I don't know how--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Constitution saving throw. What's the DC on that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18. It does not make it. 16. So 8d8 necrotic damage to it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Necrotic damage? Best kind.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, jeez. What was that? Seven. Seven plus five. Seven, eight, 13, 16, and then another 12. Where was I at? 18. Oh, so 28, 32, 33 points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 33 points of necrotic damage to the frost worm. As you reach out with your hand and grasp it, you can see now its icy white exterior all of a sudden shudders in place and you can see small cracks of black veins begin to spring out from your hands into its body. Its frozen breath all of a sudden thaws briefly into a dripping drool as it is stunned momentarily, and it pulls away, wrestling itself from your grasp. It did not enjoy that at all. So that's your action.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to once again not move. Can I go ahead and cast Healing Word on myself?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As a bonus action? I don't see why not.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nine, total. That does help.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn, Keyleth. Vax, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. I want to see if I can use the haste to do double distance to get behind Pike in that little alcove. If I can't go that far, I'll use dash to get behind her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could. You can get behind her.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Without the dash?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, because of your haste, you can move 60 feet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm standing right behind her and I say, Pike, I'm a little banged up. Dagger, dagger, dagger.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go for it. It is just-- or no, it's within 30 feet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 17 for the first. 21 for the second.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits, hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 18 for the third.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All three hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it sneak attack because Keyleth's standing right next to it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, so first one is four. This is doubled, so that's 15 plus... 16, 21, 25, 28, 36 for the first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Second one is nine, and the third one is ten.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Damn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, as your barrage of blades (spinning noises) go spinning right over Pike's head, she feels the actual wind distortion (puff) past her hair, sending strands kind of wafting in front of her face as she just stays perfectly still, trusting you. The blades all (impacts) sinking into it, one of which strikes an area of the side of its body armor where the plates on the armor had seemed to be cracked from the blackened veins from her Blight spell. As it does, the dagger doesn't even stop and plunges directly into its body, and you can see a gout of dark, deep red blood just (spurt) out from the wound. It (screeches) shakes in place from the impact, the pain, it's starting to look a little harsh.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Done.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, ends your turn! That brings us to the purple worm.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: LAURA & MARISHA: (singing) Purple worm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Purple worm is going to now emerge from the impact--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on, fight the big cocksucker.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (boom) It comes tearing through, making its bite attack against you and its tail attack against you as well, because of Pike not moving.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Question!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pike probably doesn't, but do I have any advantage being that I'm in this little closed-in bubble?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically, no, because it has reach. And it just kinda swerves around the inside and it knows this cavern pretty well as it's been through here a few times. So. That's going to be a 23 to hit on you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Of course that hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For the bite attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Even with its disadvantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, with the disadvantage-- sorry, the second roll-- thank you for reminding me there. It would have been a 13 on the second one plus nine, that would be 20.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Still hits! Uncanny Dodge please! To halve the damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To halve the damage? Yeah, you can do that on this one. But first then there's the bite. I will do that now. That is 21 points of piercing damage?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Unconscious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With it halved?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 21 halved?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21 halved would put you at 11.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, yeah. Okay, no, I'm still on my feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (dazed mumbling)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, its jaws attempt to close around you, I need you to go ahead and make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hold on. 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16. As you try and move out of the way, it's not quite fast enough as darkness takes you, the mouth (slam shut sound) clamps around you, (gulp noise) and you are swallowed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You didn't even get healed! (panicked gasp)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Still conscious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends its turn. Now having it appeared, as this round has happened, I would like both Grog and Percy to--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to shoot the purple thing with a violent shot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How many points into it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to drop all three points into violent shot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay! That adds plus six to your misfire. So you have like a 46% chance of misfiring on this shot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If I roll a six. A six or lower. It--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, it adds plus two to your misfire per point spent.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh! Never mind then! Oh shit! Then never mind. Then I'm just going to take two points of violent shot. So that's--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that would bring it to a misfire of seven.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay! So take your shot.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You misfire on a seven or lower?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Holy shit, Taliesin!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But if he hits it's two additional dice damage to it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on, Golden Snitch!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You rolled a seven?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I rolled a seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you rear back, get ready to fire, all of a sudden, you pull the trigger and the way that you had customized the barrel to blast additional black powder blows up in your face and the gun actually bends out of the way and you feel the impact--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wait! I get to reroll something, don't I? Where is it? Where is it? Aw. Do I get a reroll? Yeah. One save reroll per---

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a saving throw reroll, that's not an attack, unfortunately. Yeah, the weapon misfires, doesn't do damage to you but the blast does not take off. You would have to repair the Bad News to use it again.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to pull out my new gun and take two shots.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: God damn it. (sighs)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on, Percy!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That hits! That's a 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm just going to roll the other one, too. And that's a 30, that hits. So that's, plus 12. Eight, 15, 25. That's 27 points of damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Lot of things going on in Matt Mercer's head right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. How do you want to do this?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank god! Such an asshole.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Bad News is down, I toss it to the ground, I pull out the new one. I take my shot just to get its attention to get one in the mouth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, as you take one shot (gunshot noise) it blast the side of the wall, its head turns towards you, seeing the sudden movement, and as you do you aim up, aiming for the back of its head. You fire. This time the bullet strikes true, right into the back of its throat. You can see now (explosion noise) the blowout which is a small hole in the back of its throat, you can see the cavern behind it and a little bit of light that is peeking through. It (groans) and just (impact) falls across the ground here. The Eyebite spell no longer effective but it is, currently, still there, holding the area.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (muffled) I'm still in here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep, you feel it (impact) collapse on the ground and it's not moving and the muscles go lax around you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's good, so you can move a little bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's now Grog's turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can't go get him, though, 'cause the other dick lord is still on the map.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (muffled) I'm in acid in here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can't get to him. I'll run up to the dead earthworm and try and cut Vax out of his stupid stomach. With Craven Edge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you rush up, leaping onto the body of the now-deceased purple worm, you bring the blade up and begin carving through. Go ahead and I'll say you manage to, over the course of this round, you don't have to roll for it. You just begin to tear through it with the blade repeatedly, gashing it open until eventually you can feel the blows from the outside.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did I just help midwife Vax out of this thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just a moment. I would like you to go ahead and make an attack roll with disadvantage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: An attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hits!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, I'm unconscious.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're unconscious?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, he will be once he takes his damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Unconscious--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17, so, as you strike through you feel yourself hit something else within the purple worm, and as the wound opens up, you can see Vax's bleeding, unconscious form slip out of the purple worm's body, onto the ground of the icy cavern.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ew.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You just killed my brother.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm unconscious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that ends your turn?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It was only one-- it was a couple of strikes to get him out, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, that ends it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Killed Vax.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was your saved attack. Now, finishing that turn, Scanlan, you are up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ah, me? oh. Hello, hello. (laughs) I will kill it with fire. Well, let's see, can I see Vax over there in the worm juice?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, not from your position. As far as you know, he's still been swallowed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Then I'll kill it with fire. I will use my Wand of Fireballs to blast balls at it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Your balls of fire wand.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My balls of fire, and I won't hit Key, will I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Currently, if you aim it properly. It's a big radial spell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, it's going to get Keyleth.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, it's that radius!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. You could aim it in such a way--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Forget it, I'll just do Lightning Bolt instead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a huge radius.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fireball's a powerful, dangerous spell, if things are in close quarters, but against mass amounts of enemies, it's brilliant.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So I take two steps to my right, so no one else is in the line and I will lightning it instead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Go for it, go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 8d6, yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep, that is an 11 on its dexterity saving throw. Full damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 31 points of lightning damage to it. All righty! As you step to the side, releasing the bolt of lighting energy, it blasts into the front of its face. You can see one of its jaw mandibles gets torn off from part of the impact, you can see now the deep red blood begin to pool on the side of its face and drip down as it looks over, whipping its head in your direction.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whimpers) Do I still have any movement?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you only moved ten feet, so you still have 15 more feet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to try to shuffle back into the tunnel there a little bit. And for my bonus, I'll Healing Word myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, what is that, d4? Great, yeah, six points. Awesome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percy, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take another shot at the big icy worm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's got to be close to death now. That's 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17 just barely hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, both hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Get it, Percy!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your pistol now needs to be reloaded.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes. Well, that's my third-- Third attack is to reload. I keep track, I'm good. 21 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Stay where you are or you going to--?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yeah, I'm staying where I am.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Vex, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to Hunter's Mark him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because what else am I going to do? Oh, Pike can help you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's unconscious; don't listen to that piece of shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can't tell what happened; Grog went to save you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Huh? Oh, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 29 on the first hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 29 hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And 27 on the second hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. 20 on the first hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 18 on the second hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Got it. Both arrows (impacts) sticking into its side, you can now see multitudes of the shafts sticking out. It's still standing. It's a hardy, hardy creature. You want to move or you want to stay where you are?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to stay where I am.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket's still sitting there wanting to help, but not able to do anything. All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So you mean, Trinket is doing what Trinket always--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shut up! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike screams out, "Vax!" and runs up the body, climbs up to the top and jumps off, landing next to your unconscious self. Reaches down and is going to use her one 6th-level spell, Heal.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you immediately regain 70 hit points.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's like Pulp Fiction with the adrenaline shot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Goes from a serious frown and a worried, furrowed brow to a big smile as you come back to consciousness. "Vax!" as she goes and hugs you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank you, Pike.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We are still hungry! And I rush up to giant dick smear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Leaping over-- (grunt, running sounds)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I would like to use reckless attack on my first of all three great weapon master.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You can use them all. All of them are affected now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right! So, advantage on all of your attacks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, Jesus. What's 29 minus five? 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That probably--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That hits, too.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. I've got to do the math. 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. 12. 20, plus ten, 30 for the first one. Eight. 13. 21, 31 for the second one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog, you've never been so hot!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Three, eight, 16, 26 for the third one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 26. How do you want to do this?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'd like to take Craven Edge and jump up, straight up, as high as I can and drive it straight into the top of its cavity and just drag it down and open it up like a beautiful bouquet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it does so, you just use the heft of your weight, grinning as you drive the blade down the entirety of its body. As you grind down to the surface, you can see its armored back just pop open, like a freshly cooked sausage-- just the insides spill out onto the ground. By the time Grog reaches the ground, you are coated in thick, thick crimson. Strangely enough, even though the blood is liquid, you feel almost like this crystalline force, like there are actually ice crystals within the blood stream itself from the cold that emanates from its body--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like Icy Hot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes! And as you land and hit the ground, its body slaps forward, barely missing Keyleth as it wet hits the ground. Almost like a shrimp that had its entire back torn open. It's just in two pieces face down on the ground. Right there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Good work, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I want more. Who's next?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Shh!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Calm down, Grog! Calm your tits, Grog!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I look in the blade and go: that was good, wasn't it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You did good, my friend. Very, very good."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hi, Grog.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who you talking to, Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was good, wasn't it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was very good, yeah! You did good!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, fucking answer me next time, Jesus!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sorry!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I speak quietly into the earring and say: could everybody shut the fuck up, please, and can we get out of here? Quietly?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No! There's gold! There's lots of gold on the other side!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, let's call another two worms, let's do that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: These are probably the only ones! It's a male and a female!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How do you know that!?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They fucking hated each other. They hated each other!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah! They were trying to kill each other!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah! They were married! They're a married couple! They hate each other!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Scanlan, that's only your relationships!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scanlan, you're right there. Get as much gold as you can and Dimension Door over to the teleporter.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm here? What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're right by the gold!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh you mean, I'm going to get the gold?!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Get the gold and Dimension Door!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't have a Bag of Holding! I weigh 14 pounds! I can't hold that much gold! Gold is heavy!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can get over there. Do we want gold?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, we want fucking gold! Wait, isn't there gold all over the place?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's like smatterings of single pieces across the floor, but this one tunnel, the hoard itself is pouring into the tunnel left behind.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I need it!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Go grab the gold, let's get the body, and we'll get out of here. We have to search the body as well.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I run over to the gold. I run around the worm and run to the gold. And I (yelling) frenzied rage-loot this shit!. Just hacking away at it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Slapping the stone and pouring all the rest of the gold you can get your hands on inside this--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes! Oh my gosh, get so much gold!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Giant scoops into the Bag of Holding. It's just pouring off the sides of it onto the ground and you're having to scoop it back up inside.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I take out like my little filet knife and I start going to town on the frost worm in front of me, trying to salvage anything that I can from him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I call Trinket and I tell him to get over by the teleportation circle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a nature check real fast.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My book! I got my book!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who, me? Nature check?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's me. I got my book, which gives me advantage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm meeting Trinket, and I'm going to lay-slash-nap on his back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I'm going to run as fast as I can over to where I can see them hoarding the gold, because I want to see it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You get over there pretty quick.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to check the frozen body.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As Keyleth checks, you check the frozen body.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is that the dead man?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There isn't much that can really be pulled from this other than that. There's not a whole lot of material on--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I vial any of the blood?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can bottle some of the blood, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I want to do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you bottle some of the blood--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I'm going to take that mandible if I can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you remove a mandible. So you can mark that down. All right, so you guys are gathering money.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We don't have anything to store it in, really.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I try to get some of the icy armor off of the big worm that's right next to me now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You step up to it. I mean, most of the armor--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just want to pull on it and see if I can get some of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The parts that you pull on, that are like big hefty chunks that would be of any real use, are part of its body. The few that are busted from the damage you dealt to it throughout the combat, they're such small pieces and they crumble at your touch.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's okay, I'm more interested in gold anyway.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it possible to move the frozen man, or is he just really stuck in there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go ahead and you grab onto him, and he's actually frozen to a coat of ice that is left in there, and looking at the ice pattern, you get the sensation that that frost worm may have frozen him in there, had seen him previously and, unable to reach him within the very back of that alcove, just frost breath-ed, this one or another like it did so.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Keyleth! Can I borrow you over here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. What do you want?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are your hands dripping with blood right now?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can you warm him up and see if we can get him out of here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you begin to slowly--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We were trying to do this before. We were trying to melt his face because Pike was going to do a talk to dead spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We know what happened to him now, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we've got to get out of here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, anything else you want to do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I guess we're taking the body? I'll focus my heat on his feet so we can just dislodge him and throw him over our shoulder and go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The ice slowly begins to melt, you gather you probably have another five to ten minutes before he'll be free.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's pretty long. Too long.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Got the gold? Let's go. Let's go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're still gathering gold, it's going to take you a while to get all this, it's a lot of-- it's a small opening--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we leave the cave or do we use the teleportation circle?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Teleportation circle.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How much time is it going to take them to get the gold?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Probably, to get all of it? Another probably 15 minutes or so.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Jeez.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because you have to like get in the cavern and pull out chunks, so it's a big hoard.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How about this, let's spend five minutes doing all this stuff and see where we're at.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's rolling, he's rolling!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Son of a bitch, we should go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're having this conversation, the ground begins to quake and you can just see--

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Go! Run run run!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It could be an unrelated seismic event.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scanlan, run!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, as you all rush around the corpses, heading towards the teleportation circle, you--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I smack myself with Bigby's Hand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Giving yourself a lift as you're pushed along over the course, you guys rush over to the teleportation circle, right as you hear the ground erupt about 30 feet behind you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In a very similar fashion as the initial arrival of the worm, and you hear a similar shrieking sound.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Slow-motion turn around, is it a purple one or a blue one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Immediate comparison? You get the idea, and as you were tearing it apart-- Both of these were adolescent. They weren't fully grown.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Run!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Must go faster. Must go faster.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All of you guys rush onto it, one after the other, onto the teleportation sigil, the sigil carrying each of you back to your destination before the purple worm can reach you in time, you all now find yourselves standing in the room beneath the house that previously belonged to Krieg, safe, with as much gold as you could carry in the time period you had.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Which is a good amount, I have a feeling.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll come back to that in a minute, but first we're going to take a little break for the restroom, guys. So we'll see you back here real fast, we'll make this a quick break, and see you soon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Five minutes. Five minutes. Don't leave.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome back, everyone. So. Returning, as the party calms down after the harrowing encounter with a couple of worm-based entities. What would you like to do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry about that whole cloud mist thing, you guys. I was trying to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We almost died.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Sorry about that. Thanks, Vex.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Look, it was something new, I'm still working out the kinks, all right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't do it again. Not in combat.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It'll be really cool next time I try it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 20. Anything left? Or is it just where I, we--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Same setup where you left it, but the same pattern to escape that you recall from before.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There were traps left still. Still the same, all right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Still the same pattern, so you guys all, thankfully, due to Vax's viselike memory, follow the path through the tiles to avoid the traps that are set entering that room. You make your way back up the stairs to the gallery room that contained the tapestries, the domino set, the gold tea set, the skull with the gem, all those things.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I say we grab the tea set and the skull and take them to Lady--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Dr. Dra?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, actually, maybe we should have it identified first.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So, whatever we find in the house is what we give him a percentage of, yes? Yes?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Technically, he's not an honorable man. But we should be.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right, and honorably, it is truthful to say that we didn't find it in the house. Technically, it's across the fucking world.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's true. Give him a bit of the tea set, we give him the dominoes--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They tried to steal our money, Scanlan, and you're letting them have free rein in our house right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's their nature.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm still really confused as to why we came back here to begin with.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We were checking it out to see if it was safe.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right, well, that's been confirmed, it's not.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right? We found the owner of the house, and he's been frozen.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we report this to the officials and try to quarantine the house, destroy it, something?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think that would be wise.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Quarantine the house?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just destroy the portal, destroy the teleportation circle.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Certainly can't have anyone else moving in here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should take it for ourselves. Just to keep it safe.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Take the gold, or the house?

lines.name: TRAVIS, LAURA
lines.text: The house.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should let Emperor Uriel know that we should take control of this house because it contains very powerful secrets.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We should find out what that skull does.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What does Pike think about that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I mean, we should let Uriel know."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can't look at him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But we also made a deal. And we're people of our word."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, Pike, we made a deal for anything we found in the house.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't condescend to Pike.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm not condescending Pike, I am rationalizing this agreement.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm still really confused as to why we are trying to maintain honor to inhonorable people.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because we're better than that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to tell him you said that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, why do we care if they have money?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's count our money first before we make that decision. But I'm mainly concerned what Pike feels about taking control of this evil, evil house.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's not evil, evil. It's not an evil house.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's got an evil, mysterious gem-eye looking at us right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, exactly, it's got secrets. We have a house that has powerful secrets in it, that people shouldn't be in. I'm saying we should claim it so that we can keep other people from falling victim.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. If in claiming it we can get someone, some sort of religious person in here to clear it for us, making sure that it's-- Pike would be an option.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How is this going to sound to Uriel? Excuse me, Uriel, just want to let you know that we broke into General Krieg's old house and found out it's really dangerous. Can we have it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, we just say-- Keyleth, really?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I'm just saying, how do we phrase this?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You think that's how you would phrase it? You'd say: we heard rumor that the owner of the house had gone missing. We went to investigate and discovered very powerful, dangerous secrets within. We know where he is. He's frozen on the other side of a portal. We need to make sure nobody else falls victim to it. So we close off the house and we say we'll keep it safe. For the time being.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And what happens when he asks why we were there in the first place?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We tell him we

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That makes sense to me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We've probably earned a bit of trust at this point.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're part of the council.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think it's a very fair-- Percy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would agree. I don't think it's necessary for us to claim ownership for it. We just need to have it cordoned off and make sure no one else, other than us, can come in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Exactly. I'm not saying it's ours. I'm saying we just make sure no else comes in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're leasing with an option to buy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is the skull with the gem in there still?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's still turned away, and I believe you put a tapestry over it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, we did.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's bundle it up in the tapestry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That thing is trouble, though, that thing is trouble

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, let's take it to somebody who--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Take the skull?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we should take the skull and show it to someone who might know what it is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, I go over and grab the tapestry and the skull, hold it like a knapsack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make-- no this is fine, it's relatively light.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can you hear me?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, Grog, we can hear you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Right, good, maybe--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh shit, the whispers. If you haven't read the comics, check it out on geekandsundry.com.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And while you're there, spend some money at Gilmore's Glorious Goods. Gilmore's, where all of your magical items can be procured. With a smile a week.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughing) That was the lamest slogan ever.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All of your items can be purchased.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm exhausted.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shut the fuck up! Wait, wait, wait. Last part, last part, last part.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And don't forget!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't forget?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If someone's whispering in your ear, it's probably the sound of your conscience saying: "Go buy a T-shirt!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I take off running out of the house.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys are having this conversation, Grog just bolts out of the house. Just runs up the stairs, out through the foyer, and is--

lines.name: LAURA, TALIESIN
lines.text: Grog!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I start running after him, and I'm hasted.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, it's reverse whispering!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's the reverse whisper!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Guys, this is the rest of the show.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're not talking, there's just tongues in ears.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) Lalalala.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wet willie.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm running out stealthing, after him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I stop and I get the golden tea set. And I take off after him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (yelling) Guys, you've got to come out of the house, now!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, we're running out of the house.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We've got to get out of the house. Now!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're running out of the house.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, okay. We're running out of the house. Christ.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm following him out of the house, so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. You all rush out. You're now out of the foyer. You burst out the front of the home itself. You're in the front yard at this point in time, in the slightly dead grass.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's going to go Poltergeist on us, isn't it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The house just collapses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The sun's still high in the sky, late afternoon at this point.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What the fuck was that about?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The house and the skull are linked. As long as the house stands, his evil will grow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whose evil?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It didn't say. The house has to be taken down to the ground. The portal must be destroyed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Says who? Who's in there?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: premonitions at times, it runs in my family.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Since when, Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know, when I'm drinking ale, this voice goes like: "Stop!" But I'm like: "No." And I keep going. And sure enough, I should've stopped.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But you haven't been drinking today.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That voice is usually me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you saying anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog. Make a deception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going to say, over the course of everyone listening, Grog hasn't been really fancy with wordplay or deception. He's a very blunt, upfront person, and it's very awkward to see a childlike mind attempt to convey a fictional story like the one he's been pretending.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So, you're lying.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're lying, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What? Why do you say that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Because you're really bad at it. And it's hilarious.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Reverse psychology. I'm really bad at it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, you are.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That didn't work.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, it didn't.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I want to walk right up to Grog. Right up to his nipples, because that's as high as I go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: First, and this is a smaller detail, I shaved half your beard, correct? It's correct. You've cut me open at least twice, right now. Pike, come here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike walks up. "Yeah?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've been acting all kinds of fucked-up for a while now, and I know you don't want to disappoint her, your best friend. Something's going on with you, and it's time to talk about it. You're talking to yourself, you're talking to your own asshole. You're talking to that fucking sword, you're talking to trinkets we're picking up in houses. What is going on?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Talking to the sword?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And she's listening. And she knows when you're lying, and she knows when you're telling the truth.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pike?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She does give you this concerned look that only a possibly disappointed friend can give you, like, "I am worried about you, Grog."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Honestly, I'm hurt. I'm offended. And we are not fucking equal. If you want to get equal, we can step out here, and handle business like men.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who all is around to see this?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've cut you open twice. Twice.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I walk away. I walk off. I leave the fucking house.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're already out of the house.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as you guys are standing in front of the house, Vax just steps out into the center of the Cloudtop District, in the direction towards the exit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Gone. Stealthed. Laters.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pike, can I talk to you for a second?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah. Grog, anything."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (scoffs) Talking to my sword. The skull has a voice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What do you mean?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. I picked it up, right, because I was just going to carry it out, and it said, like: "I "can grant you a wish. Any wish that you want."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We've been told something similar before, and that didn't go too well. Put the skull down, please."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. But it's a wish. We can wish for anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Grog, please, trust me? Put the skull down."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't want to put it down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I know. Do you trust me?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Put the skull down, Grog."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I drop the skull.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Let us see what this is about, first."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pike, can you discern what kind of entity this might be attached to?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I had a feeling before." And she pulls out her healing symbol and casts Detect Good or Evil again in the direction of the skull. You can see she recoils the moment that she concentrates. "The "aura is definitely evil from this object."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe it was lying to you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Lying? I hadn't thought of that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that all you have, Pike? That's all you can find out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You have to take it to somebody who knows it or spend some time with it, perhaps."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How about this, how about nobody ask the skull any more questions?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, no one touch the-- Is it just laying on the floor right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just laying right there, off to the side.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Put it in the Bag of Holding?

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't like evil things in the Bag of Holding. We have lots of weird things in there, I don't know how it'll react.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to pull out my sword and pick it up by the eye socket.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The empty one? Okay. You lift it up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to carry it on a stick.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we put a cloth over it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, that might look a little weird.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's going to look weird with a cloth over it, but please, go ahead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Vex, as you approach it and go to throw the cloth over it, you get a brief view of the gem that's in the socket. And where there was a slight shimmer to its surface when it was looking to before, you can now see briefly what looks like some sort of a ghostly face appears across the surface for a second and then fades.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You throw it over it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That thing's alive. That is definitely alive.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What, the skull?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, no, no. There's definitely something in that stone. It looked at me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can we take it to someone; who do we know? Not Gilmore, this is beyond--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Allura? She's not here, she's--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Allura's in Whitestone right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If only we had some way to magically transport to Whitestone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We do actually have a way of magically transporting to Whitestone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. We do. Could you go?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. Just one of us though.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you transport items with it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: As long as they're on you, as long as you're holding them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But Percy, to be fair, you've had a bit of a weakness with, you know, evil entities being attached to you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Besides, if it grants a wish. I get the fucking wish.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You get the wish, Grog, you sure get the wish.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, it's not going to-- It's not granting anyone's wish.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could send Pike with it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, if want to sleep a day, we can all just bamf back. We can tree stride back to Whitestone, if we want to take a nap.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, we're going to sleep with this skull in our house?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I've already spent my one 6th-level spell turning us into fucking clouds.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You didn't turn me into a cloud.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Honestly, if I would've turned everyone into a cloud--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll keep it locked in my workshop for now. We can make it a night. And we will make sure that they know we have to deal with the house.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who has to deal with the house?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to go speak to Uriel and see if I can tell him what just happened.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You by yourself?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can all come with me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll actually-- I've got a great idea.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. We'll leave the skull with Uriel.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll take the skull to Whitestone, and I'll see you in the morning.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: After you've been corrupted by it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How about we all go together to Whitestone?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was just thinking it'll be a way of getting the skull out of the house tonight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but then it'll be in Whitestone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll leave the skull in this house--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a very fair point. We're not leaving-- I don't think that's a good idea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What, hang on, Grog. You were--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why did you run the skull out of the house?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes. Exactly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I told you. The house is evil. The portal has to be crushed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, that part's true?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The portal has to be crushed?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's an evil portal. Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who told you that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The skull did.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, in addition to the wish? Oh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know. Maybe the skull was trapped in the house. Maybe it wanted to get out of the house.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's like a genie.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't look at me. I'm just the translator.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, this is weird. We need some help on this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why was it talking through you, Grog? Why not Pike?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we'll get answers from Allura.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If you can ask it questions, maybe we could ask it a few more questions?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm okay with that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No. It will hypnotize us and corrupt us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's in a knapsack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think we should hide it and then open it up when we're in front of Allura.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fair.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What time is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right now, it's mid-afternoon. Two, three o'clock in the afternoon.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's let Uriel know what's happened.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll go on a quick pub crawl.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got to get home and work on a few things, anyway. I've got a broken gun.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I guess I'll go with Percy and take the skull, and I'll make sure we put it somewhere safe in the keep, if you guys want to go talk to Uriel.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pike? Grog? What do you guys want to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do we want to do, Pike?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know. We wanted to go talk to Uriel."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you want to come with us, Pike? Do you want to be with the skull, Pike, or do you want to go talk to Uriel?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I should walk with you with the skull."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, I think that would be best.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Before we all part ways, can we do a quick accounting of the gold?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can't just count it right here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll count it back when we're--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Away from your friends, but back at the keep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Fair enough.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So, as you guys make your way back to Greyskull Keep with the skull, keeping it properly covered so you're not walking through the city with a giant gold skull at the end of a sword. You head towards the palace. You make your way through the front to the outer doors. The throne room is currently closed, and there is heavy guard up, and upon you approaching, "I'm sorry. Do you have "business with Uriel?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not at the moment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But we will, once you tell him that we're here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. Hold on." He steps inside. The doors close. About two minutes pass. The guard comes back out. "I'm terribly sorry. Uriel currently is in a very heated discussion and "cannot take guests at the moment. Would you like me to relay a message?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, but we would like to write it down first.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Actually, while you were gone-- And I cast Friends on him. While you were gone, other guards came by and said we were clear to go in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can go ahead and make a deception check with advantage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He goes, "Other guards? Uriel himself just told me I can't let anyone inside."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, they must have seen him right after you saw him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Uriel looks up immediately and says, "I'm sorry, we're not taking any--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We heard there was a council meeting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Technically, no, but yes, what is your business?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're here because there's a council thing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're here to report a security concern of the utmost importance and urgency to you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Very well."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is everything all right, Uriel?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Everything's fine. What would you like to bring to the council?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we among friends here and free to talk in front of everyone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks around. "These are my trusted advisors and my trusted palace guard. Yes."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We've been alerted to some evil afoot in your kingdom yet again. The former Krieg's homestead has been vacant for a while and apparently has a portal to an evil realm inside. We went to investigate, acting on a tip from--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: An old friend.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The owner that was missing has been killed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So, Krieg's estate, which was sold off after his disappearance over a year ago, you're "telling me contains some sort of evil portal."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Was this built by the new owner?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I believe it was built by Krieg.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Built by Krieg? How are you certain of this?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Our informant told us as much. We don't want to give his name.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It seems rather old, this portal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Where is Krieg now?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have no idea.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. Well, we'll send a security force to keep a very close eye on the house while "it is investigated."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's extremely magically dangerous. They should not set foot inside the place at all.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Incredibly dangerous. It might be best if we investigate it ourselves.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, if you'd like. I was going to wait until Allura returned and I was going to "assign her to it, but if you feel confident, then I will leave the investigation in your hands."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Will you notify us when she returns?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I will."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there anything else?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. You all look quite lovely today, and we will leave you to your business.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Asum chuckles a little bit. The rest of them acknowledge, Tofor gives a nod, and Uriel closes his eyes for a second and rubs his temple and goes, "I appreciate the information. If you "please, we have matters to discuss."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just real quick before we leave. I'm sorry. I think I had a burrito. Can I just use a facility inside? A restroom or something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Certainly."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll wait for him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just wait out of earshot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Far away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you." They wait as you guys leave the chambers. The guards close the doors, and you're welcome to go. There are a number of various WCs, water closets, throughout the palace.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They closed the doors?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They closed the doors?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're not going to let you crap in the middle of the throne room!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, but I thought I could wait in the back of the throne room, out of earshot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The guards are pushing you out of the throne room. This is a very private meeting.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Excuse me, handsy. I'm leaving.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Sorry, Miss. Orders of Uriel." They push you out and close the doors.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've been in the throne room before?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have been, yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you have eyes on them?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, they fucking shut me out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Give me ten minutes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you need a scroll?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I sit down on the WC.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you take your potion?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I don't. Instead, I Polymorph into a fly, and I'm going to fly my way to the throne room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right. You fly through, over to the doors. The front doors?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Of the throne room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How are you getting into the throne room?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The doors are closed, yes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there any gap at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a slight gap on the bottom.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to crawl in there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you come by, one of the guards swings at you. You dodge out of the way without issue and make your way underneath the doors and raise your flight pattern.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I start chatting up the guards on the outside of the door to distract them a little bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go ahead and make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Dexterity? Oh, no, someone's got a fly swatter! Ten?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you cruise in for a moment, you can see the throne room itself, in its round pattern, has designs carved into the walls, almost like Celtic knots. There are a number of these designs right towards the sides of each entrance that previously just looked like a design, but they emit a dull glow for a second, and a burst of arcane energy comes out from them. You find your form immediately unfurl into that of Scanlan the gnome, which then plops back onto the ground, your Polymorph spell dispelled. All of a sudden, the talk stops and the entire council turns back towards the entrance as you're catching yourself on the ground.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Surprise!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That one's full. The one that I tried to go into? It's full and it needs a big cleaning.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good to know, Scanlan."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I thought there was another one this way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There isn't, Scanlan."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Carry on, then. You should send someone up to service it, though, right away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks over to Tofor, and Tofor goes--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a matter of security.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now, please."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Two lefts and a right, and I'm out? Thank you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Matt's got to be using Botox, because he didn't move! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you gather, due to recent events, that the magical defenses have been reinstated, with the current circumstances. The doors open again, and Vex, as you turn, you see Scanlan being led out of the doors.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scanlan, what are you doing here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shat all over my plans. Let's go home, I guess.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You guys make your way back to Greyskull Keep. Vax is there, waiting.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I'm not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, you didn't go back to the keep?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't go inside, on your life.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Noted. The order just came through. Don't worry. We're gathering a troop specifically for "this. Don't worry."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not a lot of troops. Just a couple of dudes is good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're leaving, you can see there are a few armed individuals, four, approximately, that are moving towards the house to stand guard and inspect the exterior, at the very least. You return to Greyskull Keep. You guys get there, as well. Grog, you return on your own, essentially, at this point, unless you're walking with them with the skull. Vax is nowhere to be found. You do find that Dr. Dranzel, that whole team is gone, except for Zed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The drummer?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jarett, still with his crossbow loaded in his lap, though he's happy and jovial and conversational with Zed. "Ah, you've returned. Good to see all of you in good health. The rest have left into the city."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did they say why? For a performance?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The rest of the troupe's going to see if they can "get her out."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, good to know. Thanks, Zed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Jarett?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Any issues while we were gone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No issues, actually. They were good conversationalists. They were very aware of my "disposition, and I kept a very close eye on any movement, preventing them from leaving the room "unless they were as a group, except for their exit, in which Zed escorted me. There have been no "problems."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good man. I pat him on the shoulder.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's in the stockade. Only problem is getting caught. I like her style. Should we get her out?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can't just barge in there and break someone out of jail. We're known people.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't you have your sheriff badge?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughs) Well-remembered.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, can't we post a bond or something?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's customs, not sheriff.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Call the council.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's the big deal?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, but they could make the problem worse.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Those guys? They'll make it worse.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's quite special to me. I think we should-- I think

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, she's 'quite special' to you, yeah?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's one place I haven't done it, and it's in a prison.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's creepy. No, not in that way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why is that creepy?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm not interested in her in that way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But you were courting her two days ago.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Things have changed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought she spent the night in your room.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's a good person and she deserves much better than the likes of me--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's never stopped you before.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't say that, Scanlan. You've got a cube!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a rather large cube, but, listen, all right, she's-- she's-- we're related. We're related.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I don't just mean--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, what?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's a Shorthalt.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like a cousin?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like a sister?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like an aunt?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Like a mother?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Like a baby. Like a baby Shorthalt.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Whose baby?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (high-pitched 'hee' sound)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 'He'? (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Listen, don't spread the word around. I don't want my cred to be ruined, but... she's my little girl.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You dog!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're a baby daddy?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm still just adjusting to it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Holy shit!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You tried to sleep with your baby daddy?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No I didn't.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you lock that up that night?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I did not! I did not try and sleep with her. I think deep down inside, some part of me knew, which is why I gave her all that gold. I think.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You paid her for it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I may deserve that but no, no. It's not like that at all.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then you didn't know. There's no part of you that knew you had any children.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, I always knew that was a possibility, in the trade I deal in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point Zed breaks in and goes, (chuckles) "Indeed!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Easy. Listen, drummer--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's Zed."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Should I go?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, just stay and shut up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll take that, though. I take his drink.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, wow. Well, that's--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, I don't quite know how to act or behave now. And I'm going through a crisis of conscience and identity. I'm sorry; I'm off my game right now. But she's related to me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just make sure that she knows that you love her. And make sure that she knows that you're there for her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why do you keep saying she's 'related to' you? Why don't you just call her exactly what she is? Which is your daughter.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know. Okay, all right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's weird to be like, 'my child is related to me.'

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm not good with this stuff. I haven't done this before, all right? I haven't really had family for much of my life. And this is a new thing and it's going to take me some time to adjust and figure out what this means for me. All right? I've defined most of my life by the people I've slept with and now, this a new part of me that I have to figure out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, technically, it's still defined by--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was just thinking that. It's a redefinition.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You could make a really good move of it by helping her get out of the stockade.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I would like to. But I'll need some help, probably. I don't know if we can all go barge in there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (bear grunts)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scanlan needs help

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Licks the side of your face. (bear groan) Leans into you. Nearly pushing you off your feet from the sheer mass.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughs) Thanks, Vex. Trinket, I'm okay for right now. But maybe you can help best by staying here and looking after the drummer here and making sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm just here to make sure that we continue our "deal when they return. I'm not-- I don't-- I just play the drums."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You do a good job of it. Keep drinking that ale.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I give it back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I--" Takes the empty and goes and refills it from a nearby cask.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know it's late in the day, but I wouldn't mind going right away. Does anyone want to join me?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you want all of us? Or a smaller party?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Probably just a smaller party. Don't we have business to attend to here? Gold to count and--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can stay and count.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can stay with her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who do you want to take? You pick your dodgeball team.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, I like it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well to get out of a stockade, we'll need some cunning. And cunning-- And cunning.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Go ahead and ask.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I wish Vax were here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't we have earrings?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know what, we are but they have a range.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They do have a range.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Come in, Vax. Earth to Vax. Tune in Tokyo.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Approximately where are you right now?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So many secrets!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I love the whispers!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's gone to Whitestone!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, there is no response. He really is out of range.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Percy, I need you for your words, and Keyleth for your magic. Let's go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're useless.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I heal myself up first?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, I can give us--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh wait, Pike! Will you hook us up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah," And she goes over and--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to try and do a quick repair to my gun, also.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go for it. She throws down a couple of Cure Light Wounds. She's going to do 3rd level to each of you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Dope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She'll do a third one to you, Keyleth. Because you're looking pretty rough, right Keyleth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Huh?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're looking pretty rough?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm at 65 now, with that. So I'm still 30 under.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So on top of that you get another 13. Pike's going to stay with you guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so. While you guys count the gold and what you managed to gather, you find in the--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Out of sight of Zed! Just so you know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not a worry. You manage to pull from the hoard entirely, out of gold, silver, copper, platinum, the equivalent of 4,150 gold pieces.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There was another 20 or 30g there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Probably.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can go back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How much? 4,000?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 4,150 gold.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You don't want to go back in there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About 1,050 gold worth of gems.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep, in gems. Mark that. And about 750 gold approximately of art items, knick knacks, things that you would have to find a specific seller to really get the money for them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (singing) Knick knacks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tchotchkes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, like small jade statues, bits of jewelry...

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And how much in platinum?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, the gold equivalent of platinum is what it would be. The total amount is 4,000. But nice try. All right, so. You guys make your way-- After asking around a bit, you figure the closest stockade is the Promenade stockade.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, there's multiple stockades.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you make your way towards the Promenade stockade. It's a fairly grim-looking grey stone building on the outskirts of Abdar's Promenade, which is a very, very, bombastic, colorful gathering of tents and buildings and various shopkeeps. As you walk to the outside of it, approaching, you can see immediately, there on the steps, is most of Dr. Dranzel's troupe, just sitting on the outside steps with two guards at the door. And they're all talking amongst themselves, waiting outside. Dr. Dranzel is not amongst them. As you begin to step closer--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He got nabbed, too, didn't he?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) As you step closer, you can see they wave you down, and they recognize you and approach you with an excited look on their face as if they now have some sort of backup.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to whisper to Scanlan. I'm going to say, I'm going to stay back. You go ahead.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, thanks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Kent Plucker approaches you as you approach and goes like, "Scanlan. Good thing "you're here. I think we may need your silvered tongue to go ahead and help us out in this "endeavor. Dr. Dranzel's inside; he's been arguing with the warden for quite some time. We're trying "to get Kaylie out."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What happened? Why is she in jail?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And, well, we're not keen on really paying fines, "so we're trying to see how much we can get out of this with our--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's the fine?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know. We didn't go in as a full group. The guards wouldn't let us."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Was she injured in any way?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I haven't seen her. You'll have to go inside to find out."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Thank you. You won't be needed here anymore. You guys can leave.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They all look at each other. "If it's fine by you, we're going to wait for Dr. Dranzel."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yes, all right. Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do you think our play is here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we go in and pay? Should we do a bit of a ruse? You still have your Hat of Disguise, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, but I think I'm more useful as myself, rather than anybody else.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, you could be a guard taking me in there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think on a certain level, you're possibly making this more complicated than it needs to be.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, but it's fun, though? No, no, you're right, we should just go in and talk.

lines.name: TALIESIN
