lines.text: You forget you have clout. Part of the point of clout is that you spend it. You spend your clout.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, all right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: ask for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was the most privileged thing you've ever said.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Touché.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Marisha has a high clout score.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So you think just walk on in there. No subterfuge, no sneaky-sneaky, no breaking down doors?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, a little subterfuge. Let me--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've got Polymorph. I can always be a tiny thing in your pocket.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who said that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, I'm back here. I figured Percy and I were waiting back here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, okay, hi.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let me attempt to see if I can defuse this relatively easily. I will need some gold.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you lying to me to get me to pay you for a new gun?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, but that's a very good point. So later I will be asking for some gold to help me fix my new gun.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I'll give you what you need.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you have gold, Scanlan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: At the very least I'm going to need 20 gold, at the very least.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 20 gold, at the very least.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You don't have 20 gold?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, I do. Just not for your daughter.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Take 50.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That will do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you guys approach?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No trips to Coldstone with Percy. You are not the Godfather.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I will take you to White Castle, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You come to the front steps of the stockade, there are two guards there, with tower shields and what looks like halberds to each of them. One of them steps forward, putting his shield out. Not in an aggressive way, but definitely in an attention-gathering way. "Do you have business here "in the stockade?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I do; I wish to speak to the warden.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The warden is indisposed in conversation at the moment."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, he will agree to be indisposed in conversation with me. I'm Percival Fredrickstein Von Musel Klossowski de Rolo III. And I'm here on the business of Whitestone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's an ambassador.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion roll. I'll say with advantage due to the very, very, intense, believable stare of Scanlan backing you up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He gives a nod. "All right, but good luck." The two guards open the doors, and as they do you can already hear raised voices shouting back and forth. Can't really make out the words, but as you step into the inside you can see there is a clerk's desk. With a clerk sitting there, keeping one ear closed as he's trying to write in a book. To the immediate right of them, there is Dr. Dranzel in an argument with a gentleman with a well-kept mustache, thick over the top lip, slicked black hair that curls up in the back in a small poof. He's wearing a breastplate and is standing with an appearance of self-importance. At which point, as you approach, Dr. Dranzel turns and goes, "Oh good. Someone with actual--"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Shush! Who is this person?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone gets quiet and the individual standing there goes, "Well apparently, he's the "man who's bothering me. Hm?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What do you do, sir?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I just throw Dranzel a quick little wink.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What do you do, sir?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm a performer." (slight chuckle)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Excellent, he's a performer. You may leave, we have no need of you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispered) Oh, shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hmph." He adjusts his hat and--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Guard, escort the commoner out of the room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The guards instinctively step up and take his arms and they lead him out. Dr. Dranzel, taken aback and the whole time he's looking at Scanlan with this look of like--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (boom) The doors close behind. The individual steps forward.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Now that that's been taken care of, who is an authority that I may speak to?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That, I'm afraid, would be me. (sly chuckle) Pleasure to meet you. I'm Warden Cyrus "Hume. What is your name?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Cyrus Hume. I'm Percival Fredrickstein Von Musel Klossowski de Rolo III of Whitestone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This does me no service."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It will.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hmph."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am, of course, the newly appointed ambassador from Whitestone, and I have been brought down here because apparently you are holding one of my performers. A performer who is meant to be heading towards Whitestone in the next three weeks to perform for my sister.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Describe your performer, sir."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, small, plain, female. (dismissive sigh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The same one we're arguing-- I assume this other "individual that just left is one of your performers as well."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, he is. He is one of the official performers-- they're supposed to be performing at the new coronation of a brand new temple in Whitestone. Much has been arranged, much has been paid for, and I don't want to explain any of this to the royal court.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Casting-- no, not yet. 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. He goes--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Whitestone would remember the favor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good. Well, listen. There are fines for damages, or she sits until tried. Now."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Damages?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The damages to the Nervous Brook pub are estimated to be upwards of 450 gold pieces, and "the fine for drunken battery and disturbing the peace amounts to 250 gold pieces. 700 total and I "would gladly let you take that rabid dug-grubber off of my hands."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You'll watch what you say about her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, will I?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Obviously the damages must be paid--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you wish to discuss it with the three in question--" He points to one of the cells on the other side of the room and you can see that there is a set of bars, and you can vaguely see what looks like the shape of a person who's just slumped in the cell. Mostly cast in shadow.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Who are they?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Bar patrons. And they're all worse for wear."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do we know what happened?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The dog has teeth. Three against one, if the stories say true. The bar patrons and the "owner of the establishment all verified that she indeed started and finished it."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Obviously, we will pay for the damages out of your troupe's pocket.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Your majesty, are you sure you don't want to write a check from the treasury?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Quite.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've got the checkbook with me. We could just write a check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We will write a check for our friend's pocket, but for the damages, I feel that some responsibility must be taken.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm not familiar with this check you speak of. I deal in gold, as does Emon. What good does "this do me in my station if I am to show up with a simple piece of paper?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He has a very fair point.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What good is subterfuge when there's such an opportunity to create a ballad? Some sort of ballad about a cautionary tale.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could have picked anyone to be with me here. Not this. You're rubbing my face in it because I threw your gun in the lava.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You chose so poorly. You chose so poorly. It is truly impressive how poorly you chose.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Stop wasting my time, if you're going to retrieve this invalid, do so quickly."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You may come pick up your gold from Castle Greyskull in the morning. It will be waiting for you, of course, sir. In the meantime, here is 20 gold for your trouble. On top of the gold you will be expecting for all fines imposed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (high-pitched) One.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He rolled a natural 20.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, bring it. Bring it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You seemingly attempt to bribe a warden of the stockade in an attempt to retrieve what appears to "be a relatively... How do I put it? Immoral, destitute and feral creature."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Warden. This is just like this bastard. He always goes around trying to boss people around and throw his money around. And I turn and I punch Percy in the face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay! Roll for an attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Probably not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus your strength modifier.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't have any strength. One, so that's ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten. Percy, do you take it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, I take it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have to lean into it and make it look more impactful than it really is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (overly dramatic) Oh!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And then I turn around, and I punch a guard.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where are you going with this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll another attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13. You whirl around, and one of the guards is rushing forward to try and break this up, and as you swing towards him, your fist collides with the side of his helmet. It definitely shakes him for a second. It doesn't do much in the way of damage, but it does kind of hurt your knuckles a little bit. Now the guard's like, (startled sound) and stumbles back a bit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We performers demand respect and deserve it as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The warden's now stepped forward and put his hand on the side of his blade and says, "Am I to "understand you walked in here and immediately struck a guard of the stockade?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've just had it up to here with being bossed around by people like him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, would it make you feel better if he's thrown in prison?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It would.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It would make me feel better if he was thrown in prison.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, don't worry. You'll both be going."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: About this time, I come over the earpiece and I go, how's it going in there, guys?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Good. Just let me know if you need me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks to the side and two guards now, one of the ones that punched you and another one to the side both step up and are reaching--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Won't it be unfortunate when you find out I have diplomatic immunity?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Diplomatic immunity.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You both have been manhandled and brought your hands behind. You feel manacles being pulled forth, and the warden's just looking down upon both of you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I blame you for this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You should blame me for this. I'm sorry. I just had a really shitty day, all right? He doesn't deserve this. Let him go. Just take me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well. Now." And you feel the release as the manacles come away. You are escorted out of the room. You are put in shackles, brought, and thrown into the same jail cell as Kaylie.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. How much to get both of them out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're being pushed out?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. I'll bring it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's no answer at the moment. The doors close behind you, and you're thrust off of four steps. Make an acrobatics check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They were tossing your ass out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She leans forward a little bit, and you can see the light hits the side of her face, and she has a bit of a welt there and a bit of a black eye, but she doesn't look too worse for wear.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Now for the love of God, just wait until nightfall and Dimension Door out of there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did I hear that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you'd hear that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good idea. Thanks, Percy, for your help.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're welcome. Wait until nightfall.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Huh? Oh. All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As she leans forward, she goes, "Huh. Like father, like daughter, aye?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You could say so. I heard you had quite a night last night at the bar.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hm. Felt good. I like breaking faces."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Apparently you're very good at it. I saw-- I got a glimpse of your victims over there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) "They had it coming. Don't know why, but I had a feeling somewhere in their life, "they probably deserved it. Most men do."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yep, you're right about that. Stay away from all men. Forever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They were fuckwits. Their faces were so punchable."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know that feeling. Listen, I've come to get you out of here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) "Apparently you've not done that very well."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did they hurt you in any way?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Only one person's really hurt me recently."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Cold as ice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Look, Scanlan. Father. I spent a lifetime hating you. I'd imagined the moment we would "finally meet for so long, planned it out in my head, had it all worked out. My idea of you, what "you'd be like, what you'd say, and you know what? Up until last night, I was pretty spot-on. I don't "know what I wanted. I have a lot to process, to think about. But I'd prefer not to do it in this "dank cell, so if you have a way out, please, now's the time to do it."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You think now? All right, is anyone watching?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are two guards that are not watching directly, but they're muscled up against the bars and keeping an eye over the shoulder.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll need a distraction. Do you think you can come up with one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Her eyes turn for a second and she goes, (chuckles) "I think that can be done." She leans up to the side of the bar and peeks her head out for a second. Closes her mouth, cups it with her hand, and you start hearing from the opposite side of the room, through arcane ventriloquism, these three different male voices going, "I'll fuck you up!" You hear punches and you hear all of this screaming and chaos. At which point, the two guards look over. One of them gives the other a motion, and they both run off to see the other side of the room. She looks back at you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You'll have to teach me that trick. And then I Dimension Door us out onto the street.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you reach for her, she still pulls away a little bit, but you still grab hold and (poof) puff of smoke. You guys (magic sound) appear outside, landing a couple of feet above the ground and catch yourselves. You're off to the side of the stockade where it meets with one of the nearby walls. No one seems to immediately notice you, other than a couple of people that are walking down the street that see two individuals appear out of the ether and land onto the ground.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Let's get out of here. Percy, I didn't wait quite until nightfall.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I assumed you wouldn't. We're already walking back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, we'll catch up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys head back towards Greyskull? All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm glad I came in handy for that field trip.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, shit! Burn it down! Burn the stockades down!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Might want to lay low for a little bit."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good thinking.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The troupe may want to get out of town for a bit, as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I think that's the plan. We were going to stay a few more days-- we had a couple of gigs "lined up, but I think we've pressed our luck far enough, so all right! Everyone feeling "spectacular?" He claps his hands and the rest of the troupe start grabbing their goods and their instruments and what little cases and bags they do. Kaylie runs off real fast and comes back with her one over-the-shoulder satchel that carries all of her worldly belongings. "Then let us be off." He gives a little tip of the hat to Scanlan with a nod. Looks to the rest of you. "We greatly "appreciate your hospitality. We're sorry for any confusion, misunderstandings, and general "debauchery. Good night to you all." He turns around and they all start walking out. Kaylie begins stepping and she stops and looks over her shoulder towards you, Scanlan, and says, "Don't "come looking for me. When I'm ready, I'll come find you." She turns back around and leaves.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I liked them. They were fun.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you tell her you're her dad yet?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's not-- She figured it out, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's awkward.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. Yes, it is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They forgot to grab their gold. I like them!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That they did, actually.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe they thought we were even?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Probably should check the silverware, though, in the keep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. I run and check the silverware.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I check to make sure the skull is still there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The kitchen is cleaned out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All of the silverware.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about Jarett? He was supposed to be keeping an eye on them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, what the fuck? What's with Jarett?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jarett was one man keeping track of multiple people, with one very small, quick child that you were the only one able to keep an eye on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I hate your friends!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They were good drinking buddies.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're all right. They've got their good qualities, too.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just the silverware's missing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about our rooms? Is it just the kitchen that's cleaned out, or did they take everything in the keep?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, no, no, no. None of the rooms have been touched, except for the guest room where some of them were staying.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There was shit in there, anyway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, there wasn't much in there, but a couple of candlesticks, things that were just decor. Anything that could possibly be hocked for a little bit of change from those rooms is gone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They don't know I shopped for everything at Home Goods, so joke's on them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You gather probably no more than two to three hundred gold worth of materials were taken in total. That includes fine cookware, that includes decor, that includes a couple of previous art pieces that you had collected--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Please tell me they stole the giant painting.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's not here yet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Damn it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It hasn't been delivered yet. That's probably in transit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And where would it have been hidden on their person?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They could have rolled it up and stuck it where the sun don't shine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A 20 by six foot canvas?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Some caverns run deep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to check my bed just to see if there's any shit on it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go and inspect pretty extensively. It does not appear that anyone has left you a Scanlan surprise.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Percy and I go downstairs to make sure the skull is still there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Skull is still in the workshop, yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Beautiful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you guys want to do right now?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to spend some time working on the special barrel and see if I can get that up and running.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What time is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, it's closing towards dusk.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should heal up and get ready to take this to Whitestone in the morning, yes?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I guess so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18? All right. You disassemble elements of the pistol. You get the feeling that the way it's weighted, to attach the hand mortar to the pistol, it's still going to continue to be a very unwieldy thing. You are probably best to design them as separate pieces. Unfortunately, the way the pistol's balanced, for aim and such? The mechanism that's required to lob an object for the mortar to be able to do any help with is going to throw off your ability to aim much with the pistol, going forward. Not to mention increase the misfire score by crazy amounts. But you could create them both separately and swap out as needed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You guys spend the evening. You rest up, you're back to full health, you're good to go. As the morning comes around--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have a question.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I wait until everyone goes to bed and can I make my way into Percy's workshop?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's locked.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you get to the workshop, you check the door and it is, indeed, locked.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We stashed it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's the door made of?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's made of solid metal. It was constructed per specifications to be able to withstand concussive blasts in case of accident from the inside.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I try to pick the lock?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have no lockpicks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I shove an axe in the lock hole?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Clang!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a strength check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have a greatsword that's just a normal greatsword.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you going to try to shove it in the lock?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, like a credit card in the side of the thing. Like a crowbar. That was crap.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did you roll?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten. In trying to wedge the sword into the side of the door, you eventually feel a shift as you push. You feel it gives way, and you look and withdraw the greatsword, which is now bent at an angle to the side. Yeah, that sword's not going to be functional in combat any further.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, I go to bed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nothing good ever happens to you in my workshop. It's just not a good place for you. Too many things.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so. Morning comes around. You guys come back rested. As you each individually come to consciousness and finding your way down, the first thing you're met by is a very perturbed Laina, who as soon as you come down, says, "I'm terribly sorry. I went to make breakfast, and "there's nothing to make breakfast with! I don't know what happened."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's okay. Scanlan is going to buy all new stuff for our kitchens.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm supposed to lay low, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's okay. You can give her all the gold that she needs to buy new things for the kitchen.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have only--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You have about a thousand gold because I gave it to you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I gave 50 to Percy, which you didn't use.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To buy basic cooking supplies, it wouldn't be more than 30 gold to restock the entire kitchen. It was more other elements of the keep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Including the silverware?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, great.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It wasn't fancy silverware. It was utilitarian.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was decent. It was functional. It was included with the keep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, here's 50. Go get us a decent set of silverware.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And other things. Or send somebody else, if you'd rather.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm not much help around here right now, am I? All right." And she runs off, returning a short time later, with groceries, as well, that she found while she was out. Makes a fresh meal for all of you. Partway through breakfast, there is a knock at the edge of the dining hall, and you see Cordell, your half-orc guardian there. Has his big, heavy crossbow at his side. "Sorry to bother "you while you're eating. You have a messenger who wishes to speak to you at the front gate."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. Follow me."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Vax never came home last night?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Did you come home? No? Vax has not showed up yet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we be worried?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to have to collect him before we go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you go to the gate, it's opened up and you can see there, standing by himself, Seeker Asum. Hood back, bald halfling helm with his tattoos greeting you. He goes, "Hello, Vex."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hi.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've come to request your presence at the Precepts Stage within the Cloudtop District near "dusk. All of Vox Machina, this evening, if you don't mind."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. Well, why?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Uriel and I have been in extensive discussion these past few days, and the reveal of "Riskel's betrayal has had a profound effect on Uriel, and rumors have been spreading amongst the "district and the higher order of the city. Uriel is to make a statement regarding it and to prevent "any political intrigue will talk to the politically inclined populace first. As members of "the council, we would like for you to be there to help us based on the reaction. If you would be so kind?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, of course. I'll tell the rest of the group. We were planning on heading out to Whitestone today, but we can put that off if it's very important?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's rather important."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. What were you guys fighting about before? Can you tell me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's nothing you need to worry about."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Really? It looked kind of serious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I think tonight's discussion will absolve any questions you have."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is anybody in trouble?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No. You're fine. You've done nothing."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I insight check him?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We should torture him to find out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to shoot off a limb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a sense of urgency to him. He's really insisting you guys be there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Well, we will be, then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Wondrous. I will notify the rest of the council. I look forward to seeing you this evening."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, if you see my brother anywhere, can you send him home?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, I'll keep an eye out. I have a network in the city. I can probably locate him "within the hour, if need be."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No worries." He walks away. As he steps away, you look for a second. You glance away and look back, and he's gone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He is so sneaky. I need to train with him more.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Like Batman.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I go back and tell everybody what he just told me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh my god!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right? (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I suppose we'll have to put it off for a day, then.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. Is the skull going to be safe here while we're gone?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think so.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can it see inside our keep? Can it channel some beast?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's locked very far away right now, in a very secure room.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But not secure magically.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Percy, maybe me and you should make some reinforcements or something?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's just radioactive material in the basement. It's fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What if it's a portal? What if it can send a dragon to us, or a worm or something?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It did say as long as that house stands, it will be very powerful.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, do you think it would be safer somewhere? Do you think there's something you could conjure, perhaps, around it? Or should we move it to another room?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like your room is very secure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We could always send it straight away to Whitestone. But...

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But we'd have to put it with someone else, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'd have to let someone take it to Whitestone. It could be there today. Or we could keep it in my room, or we could move it perhaps into the temple of Sarenrae?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe... how many times can you use that little tree thing, Keyleth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Once a day.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know. Or else I would totally run it over and run it back.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh. But you can run it over and run back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, if I use your thing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If you, if you go there, take the stone from his sister and you can come right back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, take the stone from his sister and come back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I could.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let her know it's useless after the one use.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it safe in Whitestone? I mean, the temple of Sarenrae is at least here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Got a good idea. What if you go, you don't take the skull, you tell Allura what's going on, bring her back with you through the tree!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We keep summoning Allura to solve our magical problems. We brought her to Whitestone and now we're bringing her back?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's really, really smart!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right...

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She can go right back, you can send her right back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What if she doesn't come?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, then you come back--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'd be using a 6th-level spell as a glorified messenger? 'Hey, we found a scary skull.'

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow! Oh my god.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (high-pitched) The sickest burn. That's the sickest burn! Oh fuck!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And somehow the coffee has not been poured on your head. That's the greatest magic trick I've seen all night. How are you still dry? It's witchcraft.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know what, Scanlan, why don't you figure out how to get the damn skull back to Whitestone by yourself, how's that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why don't we just let it be in the room for now-- Let's let it be in the room for now, nothing happened last night.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nothing happened last night, but it seems like a ticking time bomb.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going down, I have to go get my things anyway, so I'm going to go down. Everything seems fine, doesn't it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Untampered, room seems left as it was.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It doesn't seem tampered with at all, the door?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The door is steel reinforced, lined and bolted to the wall; it's not going anywhere. This room is designed to explode.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, I could-- all right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe we should make sure there's, like, fabric over it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's hidden in the room.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe we should go in and check on it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I could Wall Of Stone another kind of box around it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I go into the room, I shut the door behind me. I check my hiding place.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Untouched.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And it's untouched and perfectly reasonable. I return it to my hiding place. Which, if I have to reveal it later, I will happily tell you where it's hidden. Shut and lock the door behind me. Everything's fine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a relief.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's find your brother.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. I guess we're staying in town.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're leaving the skull?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Seems okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughing) Let's at least post Jarett here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, let's post someone here, I guess.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jarett's already, by the way, off to the side listening to this whole conversation.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you ever sleep, Jarett?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I sleep when I'm not needed. But it seems right now I am needed, and I am more than happy to "stand guard. It's what you pay me for."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're so cool.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're seriously the coolest guy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, you're great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Continue." (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If anything strange happens, make note of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't let anyone in or out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, he can't, he doesn't have the key anyway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No. This is true."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm just saying.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It'll be done."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need to give him a raise.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, you do."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't you just take it from my money?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I throw ten gold at him right now, just in lieu of-- I throw ten gold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very generous of you, Percival."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's the very least.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And he sets up his chair in the far corner, staring at the door again, and sets his crossbow over his shoulder and just sits waiting.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's go find your brother.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now, Vax, what are you up to?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, I'm assuming-- I didn't go there to find anything, but I went just to think, and I didn't see anything by chance, no?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope. You detect no movement inside whatsoever. Dark windows over the course of the evening, no sign.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, well, I guess I'll go back to the keep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I will sit up. No one's there? I'll sit up in my sister's room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Well, as you guys are walking back--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Stealth, please. I'm not walking in the open.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, make a stealth check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 27? All right. All of you that are out looking for him, make a perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys spend a good portion of the morning scouting about the usual paths that you take as a group, knowing the back alleys and the various paths that you walk through Emon to ensure that you avoid the main thoroughfares and the most-used walkways, as you're glancing about you see a quick shadow shift past about the size of the individual you are seeking.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (puffs air) Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look over and you see Vax dart off around the corner and dodge down an alleyway.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Vax? Vax!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You faintly hear Keyleth's voice behind you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not now, Kiki. And I just keep going.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you find him?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Vax!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys spend the better part of the day searching for him. Asking questions, nobody has an idea. A few individuals try and squeeze some gold out of you. You eventually manage to gather they have no idea what they're talking about. By about early afternoon, two o'clock in the afternoon, you eventually make your way back to the keep, figuring that he'll find his way back if he doesn't want to be found. Upon arrival, the guards also haven't seen him. But once you go up to your room to get into more comfortable attire, your brother is sitting inside your room, waiting.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, there you are. What's going on?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Look, everything's fine. All right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I believe you. Fully.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everything's fine. I just don't know what we're doing, anymore.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do you mean?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know what we're doing, I don't know why we're doing it. I don't know! I've just been thinking about it, I mean, what is the point of our lives?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, that's a very deep question.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. It's fine, let's go. I don't know what I missed. I can go wherever everybody wants to go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. (sigh) Sit down! Seems like a problem in your mind. Are you mad because we're stealing gold? Are you mad because everybody's running off in directions and you can't keep up? Are you mad because you almost died?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No. When it was just you and me, I knew what we were doing. We were just trying to survive.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right! That's really all we're doing now, just on a grander scale.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (sighs) We're running into this shit on purpose now. Which is all right, when there's reason. I don't always know why we're doing the things we do. It was fun, breaking into that house. I'm good at it!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, you are.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know why we did it! I don't know why I'm working with a large fucking beast of a man who seems to despise me. Day after day.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He doesn't despise you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The fuck he doesn't. I don't know why we're doing it. I don't know why we're with most of these people! And I love these people, but I don't know why we're doing it! And I just want you to think about a little bit too. And I walk out the door.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I get ready for the evening.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As the sun draws across the sky, pushing towards dusk as the light blue begins to turn to a somewhat purplish-orange hue, you all gather your materials, whatever attire you wish to bring, and make your way towards the Cloudtop District. Anyone wish to do anything else?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I'm taking the other one. And putting of all my many two cloaks, I'm going to put the other one on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I swing by Gilmore's and just see if he or-- Sherri works there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sherri works there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sherri works there, if they're around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Going to ask. Sherri kinda greets you as you enter and goes, "Hello, Scanlan. Gilmore is back "in Westruun, weeks away from opening his new establishment, but can I help you?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Two things. One, when he returns, he made me a potion, a while back. I'm running a bit low. It was a scrying sort of thing. When he gets back, maybe he can whip me up another batch for next time I come pay a visit, but also-- oh, yes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She puts up her hand for a second and walks off through the beaded curtains in the back, and comes back with Gilmore.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gilmore steps forth. "Terribly sorry, Scanlan, trying to keep business right now kind of "on the DL. There's a special event tonight." And you see how dressed up he is. "I imagine, being "part of the council, you're probably invited too."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, I was just going there now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, well, I'll accompany you!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, we'll save business for another day.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, what business did you have?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I just wondered-- I may want to try to find someone at some point tonight. I don't know how.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hmm, scrying. We've had this conversation before."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, but a different sort, a less fecal sort.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not going to lie, I'm very glad to hear that."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fecal matters.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know how to scry, I don't know how to find someone or what I need. I may have a hair strand or two, but I don't have much to go on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That should be plenty. If I can't help you, I know a few that might be able to."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But! Nevertheless." And he adjusts his collar and he's very, very well dressed in his long, deep navy robes, a high collar that nips at the side of his neck. "Shall we?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Absolutely. You lead!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He leads you out towards the Cloudtop.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Could I have also gone to Gilmore's?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you'd like to.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! Oh, Grog! Oh, Jesus!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No no no, just, we go in together and when he's talking to Gilmore, I find one of the lesser clerks and I say: Do you sell lockpicks here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The other clerk is probably a new hire, you haven't seen him here before. Young, early 20s, very, very thin hair, kind of waify. "Lockpicks? This isn't--"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, you know. I keep locking myself in the shitter and I'm really tired of asking people to come let me out. It's really--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I wish I could help. Those are outlawed, I'm sorry. That's not really--"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Look, I've got these huge clumsy-fuck hands. Is there anything you could give me, maybe magical, that would just keep me from being embarrassed in front of my friends? It smells so bad and then they all come and the door opens and it's just awful!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're getting closer and closer to him, this, looming goliath who's feigning fear and worry in his face, the guy just retracts. "I'm sorry! I don't-- We're closing shop!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, do you have like a wand or a potion or like, a thing--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good night!" And he runs up the stairs to the second floor.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Lovely goods you have here. I'll let myself out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We'll come with you don't worry!" He puts his other arm out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The three of you arm in arm.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's currently like this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah! He's, like, lifted.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's the Wizard of Oz!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah! You skip along, the rest of you make your way to the Cloudtop, and you make your way around the stage and it's against the wall, near one of the entrances to the Cloudtop, but on the interior. And you can see there is a rather large stage up against the wall. There is already a crowd gathered. You see merchants, highborn families, political guests, upper-station military, a number of well-dressed representatives from all over Emon have gathered for this. You guys meet up with the rest of the group and you kind of, you know, gravitate. Gilmore gives everyone a quick wave and gives you a respectful nod. "Aha! Yes!" and he wanders off and starts mingling with some of the other guests. Just as the sun vanishes beneath the distant horizon, a procession of palace guards approach the area, the crowd parting, as Uriel arrives with the escort, flanked by his family, and the current inner council of Tal'Dorei with Arbiter Brom, Seeker Asum, Tofor Brotorus. Allura is absent of course, for being in Whitestone. They all step onto the stage along with the guards as well, as cheers and light applause begins to break out. Not crazy go wild, but just like (muted) "Hooray."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Rich people clapping, sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a little bit of confusion in the crowd, but for the most part everyone seems to be into it. At this moment, one of the guards hurries up the side of the stage and, you notice, whispers something into Asum's ear, who leans over and gives a nod and worried expression. Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (giggles) Yay!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (radio DJ voice) Don't forget to subscribe to Geek and Sundry, so you can see archives of the show and many others! I don't even know--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's hard, right? When one ear's in and one ear's out, it's tough. I was trying to plug it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Remember, Liam doesn't really hate Travis in real life! (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, wait. As soon as I notice that, I touch Grog and Vax's shoulders and I point up really fast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look up and-- you guys all gather this as well. You can see, piercing out of some of the cloud cover above, what looks to be two fast-moving streaks of color, black and red. They just-- (whoosh). And then you can't see them any more.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Could I tell from my favored enemy-ness that it was dragons?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can make a hefty perception check if you like to see exactly how much detail you can make out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I look up, too?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. I'm giving her this because of her really high perception.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, that was wrong. 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23. It's hard to make out details from this distance. They're moving quick.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: One black and one red?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tops of walls in the distance. You recognize these. These are warning bells. At which point the crowd starts murmuring and getting nervous, and Uriel puts his hand out. "Please, please. I--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I use my Primeval Awareness to see if it's actually dragons close by?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You begin to concentrate on that for the moment. Asum now steps up and says, "Everyone, "if I might ask you to all quickly make your way to your respective homes. There is a small emergency "we must attend to." At this point, you guys hear this (whoosh) sound and you turn around just in time to see what looks to be a large, larger than you've seen before, white dragon just slam into the side of Allura's tower in the distance. Claws clunk into the side, digging into the stonework, wings unfurled, it looks into the upper window of where her actual parlor is and peeks in for a second before just unleashing a blast of icy cold magical breath into the inside of the tower. You can see now, screams start tearing around you as the guards start getting their weapons ready. At which point, the dragon pulls its head back and looks about at everyone screaming, and pushes off the tower. As it does you see the stonework crack, and the top of Allura's tower shatter--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, my god!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Raishan enjoys the taste of fear."

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: Raishan?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point it leaps down onto the stage, crushing part of it. I would like you all to roll initiative.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, what?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can't fight four dragons. Can we?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, did you say four? He didn't say four.

lines.name: LAURA, SAM
lines.text: There's a red and a black, a white and a green.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are the red and black dragons?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They were red and black-- of course they were fucking dragons!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're sure?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Everything else was dragons; why wouldn't it be dragons?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: For the love of God and all that is holy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh Jesus Christ, Taliesin.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are we fighting something now?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we just fighting one?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, hi, dragon!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, hi, dragon, you're my favourite customer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike was here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't worry, I'll kill it with music.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Holy balls!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And this is the chaotic pattern of individuals amongst here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My god, look at all those fuckers!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right! Now, if I could go ahead and have the initiative scores from you guys. 25 to 20?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 20 again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anybody else? All right. Okay. 20 to 15?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 15 again.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 15 as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Ten to five?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, 14, sorry. 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan, Pike is after you. Percy, what did you get?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The castle looks really badass. It's just off of camera.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is it? Let me see if I can scoot this forward a little bit for you guys. Now. Top of the round, Grog you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are we really fighting this right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there. You're right there, where the red base is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's happening?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I dunno, what the fuck do we do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I only do one thing-- (yelling) I go into a rage! And a frenzied rage! And I take out Craven Edge, and I say, how do you feel about dragon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I think it sounds delicious; let's try a taste."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughs) Great Weapon Master-- I run up to the dragon and hack away!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, make your strikes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, fucking hell, where's that son of a bitch? 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19 misses.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 19 misses?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Everybody hear that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Dragon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just barely hits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It has an AC of 22. It's some bullshit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (mutters) That'll miss.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, how do I do anything to it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Chromatic dragons are very selfish entities and do not usually work with individuals of other color patterns. The fact that this is this coordinated between multiple is a very, very bad sign. You're suddenly brought back to a singular moment in your past when you recall seeing four orbs embedded in a wall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, no, I think we-- We brought this on ourselves.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Chickens come home to roost.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, Grog, damage on the one strike?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just on the one. Oh, yeah right, I'm sorry I was so caught up in the fact that I'm just literally going up against death incarnate-- hey!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We had no fucking reason to go into that basement.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Raishan-- (roars). As you can see now, this burbling cloud of greenish black fume just spills out of its open jaws, outward towards the crowd.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Jesus!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jesus Crit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need Grog, Vex, Pike, and Vax, and Percy to all make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Am I in there as well?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I was in there as well, I think.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You were as well, yeah. You guys were as well. So all-- Yep. Pretty much everyone but-- heh-- everyone but Trinket, probably for the best.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ten plus eight is 18.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is a constitution saving throw?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I use Cutting Words on this? Is this a magical effect? No, wait.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No this isn't a saving throw thing. It just happens.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oof!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Bad?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Five.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 14 with resolve.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All of you take 66 points of poison damage, as you feel your lungs and your outer flesh begin to burn and curl.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 20 didn't save?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope. The rest of the crowd around you screams out in horrible pain as the rest of them gasp and fall to the ground.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Holy fuck, he just took out the entire council.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If I had resistance to poison damage because of the Belt of Dwarvenkind, is that halved?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take that halved, yes. You take only 33.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, fuck me. I'm like, I can't remember-- I can't remember what I'm trying to do. We got to go!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, before your turn is over, the dragon (whoosh) repositions itself for the rest of the crowd over there. You get an attack of opportunity against it, if you want.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh hey, awesome. That's a 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19? That does not hit. You go to strike-- it's already out of the way and you find yourself even amongst your rage shaken by this, as you look around for the first time and realize that the crowds of people that were around you are now face down, unmoving on the ground, amongst the open space. As it steps across the wood as it lands, ruining the last bit of stage and landing on the opposite side, Keyleth, it's your turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are there any trees nearby?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wouldn't mind turning into that mist right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No shit-- I didn't learn it! Go ahead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a tree. There's a tree about 100 feet in that direction.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 100 feet?!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or go inside.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, everyone's around me, more or less?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I slam my staff on the ground and I cast Anti-Life Shell and I say, (shouts) everyone in the shell-- we're running!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. How big is the radius of the shell?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ten feet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's enough for all of us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's enough for all of us if we gather.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's your radius there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm right there already!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pike and Scanlan are in it, everyone else needs to get close.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep, all right, and you're going to stay there? Wait for everyone to gather to you, or are you just going to run and everyone else has to catch up? Which, if everyone else makes a dash movement, they could probably get to you next round.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, just go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, yeah, I'll do like 20 feet, not my full 30 but enough to where people-- no, fuck it, I'll do 30 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you're 30 feet up to the edge there. All right, that ends your turn. Vax.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I click my boots, and I-- Shit, where is everybody?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Running towards Keyleth.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I yank Trinket by the fur on his butt and say, come on Trinket! And then start running backwards and grabbing at my sister's cloak as I go towards Keyleth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, with the boots of haste you get up within this area pretty easy. Trinket turns and sees you run and looks over towards you, which, it's your next turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I don't know why we're not running inside, instead of away. Are we running?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're running to the tree. So we can Transport Via Plants, was the thought.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Got it. Okay, I'm going to shout out in Draconic, and I'm going to say: Raishan! Is that his name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Raishan is what it seemed to refer to itself as.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Raishan!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You got it, you got it!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So sorry for whatever pissed you off so bad--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, you had it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Leave the townspeople alone. And I take off

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. I imagine you tell Trinket to do the same?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, of course.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you rush up. Trinket comes and gathers off to the side there--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's going to kill us, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! Oh! Can I cast something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say, you are now there, for those who want to see there, technically, there off to the side.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I cast something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To get over there would take both-- it would take a dash action, so, no. Unless it's a bonus action, then you could've, like Hunter's Mark if you want to do something like that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess I'll do Hunter's Mark on him. I was going to do Protection From Poison, so I might not full dash.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, we'll say-- up to you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that a radius thing or just for yourself?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you want to do? Hunter's Mark?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll Hunter's Mark. I'll just dash. I'm just stupid.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Matt, probably too late, but can I retcon-- say I'm holding my attack, since I didn't do anything? Fine if not, I just thought--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say sure. So we'll let you have it. All right, holding your attack for what?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If it bears down on us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Me? I'm going to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) What about Gilmore!? Where is he? He was right next to us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just keep-- it's not about Gilmore right now-- it's Scanlan's turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where is he?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can make a perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12? You don't see Gilmore anywhere. You look about the bodies. You know the color of his robe, but you don't see it anywhere on the ground. In the chaos you really have no idea where he is.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will use it as a Interposing Hand, blocking him from approaching us. And I will use my movement to climb into the circle of good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you can get there. Okay, that ends your turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I'll-- shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Want to inspire somebody?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I guess, I mean, who's near him? Just Grog right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right now, it's Grog, Percy and Pike are all still out right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They'll get away right, they're going to run? You're going to run, right? They'll be fine. All right. I'll inspire Grog by saying, you're a magnificent, handsome bastard, don't die!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You take a d10 inspiration die.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike is going to rush right here and is going to attempt to cast Mass Cure Wounds. Mass Cure Wounds as a 6th-level spell, so that's 4d8 plus five. Six creatures in a 30 foot radius. So that'll be-- all of you. She's not going to do it to herself. Or, she can't do it to Grog, so she can get--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grog, did you get hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She can get everyone but Trinket, but Trinket seems fine, so-- that is seven, eight, 12, 15 plus five-- 20 points healed to all of you guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great, that'll help.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Except for Grog. That's going to be her turn, and she just moves into the circle there with the rest of her movement. That brings us to Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to look for Gilmore.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perception check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What happened to you, Percy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know. Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In this chaos, you have no idea where he is, unfortunately.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to hold my attack for if the dragon comes towards us and I'm going to run into the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Running as far away as possible, getting up, going at full sprint all over. The guards are trying to usher people out of the way. You have crying mothers who can't find their kid--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have absolute chaos, and at this point your hear in the distance a large explosion, as you see a rolling cloud of fire rise up in the distance over the mountain and the rest of regular Emon, surrounding the Cloudtop District. This guy over here's going to run as well. Beginning of that turn, Grog you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm booking ass.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, with a dash you get over to there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Raishan now is going to move over here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, but, I try to stop him!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The hand is going to try to--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Got a strength of 26.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's awesome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Interposing Hand just gives you cover against the target, and it can't move the hand's space if its strength is four, so it's not going to move through the space, it's going to try and move to the side. So instead of going after you guys, the hand just moves with it and keeps it in between, but it stays approximately here. It then blows towards this crowd here, just catching Grog in the corner. So Grog, I need you to make another constitution save.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With inspiration.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With inspiration, if you'd like, if you need it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (mutters) I'm okay. 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The rest of these guys except for-- Oh, no, Grog, no! Grog, no! Those guys all survive, though they're coughing and trying to get away. This brings us to end of his turn. At this point in time you look up and see (whoosh whoosh) another set of wings come slamming down onto this side.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What the hell?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughing) What is that thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it lands, it looks down at the group and then runs up the side of a building's rooftop up here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, Jesus Christ!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So we're totally getting in the tree, I know it, we're going to make it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughs) The tree has been evaporated.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, the rest of you guys, are you all moving as a group forward?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, hells yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you all go rushing-- You all go dashing forward. At full speed, aside from Vax, who can get to the tree this turn, the rest of you are going to get halfway there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So we'll say for the purposes of this movement, we'll move it backward.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's not a closer bush? Nothing closer we can jump in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, not currently. the closest large enough plant to use this ability--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Me and Pike get there, because I Dimension Door us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Actually, technically Grog can get there too, and Vax and Pike and Scanlan. You guys all get there. The rest of you are all inside the Anti-Life Shell as you're running.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not going to leave the group, I'm going to pace with them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're pushing forward, the large black dragon is just toying with you-- it's climbing across the rooftops, and just watching you as you run, and you hear it chuckling under its breath-- (menacing chuckle, whoosh, impact).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, is he taking to the air?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He takes to the air and jumps to another rooftop.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to try as I'm running-- do I have enough time to try and take a shot?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Am I going to be able to keep up with he group?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Probably not.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Never mind. Damn it, never mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're like, "shit," and you just keep running. It now jumped over onto this rooftop and Raishan has moved up toward the center and making its way towards you. At this moment, another burst of fire over the wall much closer goes (boom) and swooping out of it, out of the flames, you see the largest red dragon you've ever experienced come swooshing through the flames, rises up past. The two other dragons almost lower their heads as it passes over.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe they just want their gold back?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (whoosh) It swoops past without even noticing you all, slams onto the top of the palace, causing part of the entire throne room glass-domed structure to (shattering noise) shatter and break inward before it turns around and plants itself outward. You've seen ancient dragons-- this is large for an ancient dragon. In fact, by its sheer size, you feel like you may have have encountered this individual before when you were passing through the plane of fire.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That fuck that was like the biggest dragon ever ever?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't remember that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They guy we missed because we laid low from him and he flew over and we were like: 'don't move,' and we missed him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it lands, the two other dragons take a step back and recoil and snarl and you hear this voice come just tearing through the center of the Cloudtop District, saying, "Move on, Umbrasyl. I "claim this as my domain now. The rest of you have a task to complete. Go! I shall remain and set a "new dominion of the Chroma Conclave."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispering) Chroma Conclave, that's so cool!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point the two other dragons snap at each other and they both-- the black one just takes off in this distance. The green dragon stalks for a second and then (snarls) angrily turns around and climbs back onto the top of the wall and then flies off into the distance as well, both of them heading westward.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: West.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, we're okay! Hey guys, it's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as they curve around and start heading east.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: East?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, you guys have now reached the outskirts of the tree and you can see now this large red dragon has planted itself--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He died! He died!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where are you going? Where are you going?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do we do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: To the keep. Get underground.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We need that skull.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The skull grants a wish.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Grog!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just get to the keep-- we can talk about it there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I cast Transport Via Plants on the fucking tree!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The tree-- opens up and a small oval, almond-shaped portal and you can see, it's in the intensity, it's partially unstable but it's keeping itself clean. You guys each dive in as the Anti-Life shell vanishes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I shout: Gilmore! Before I go though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And we're going to end tonight's session on that point!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thought we were going to be starting a brand-new Shadowrun campaign next week!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know, maybe the warden of that jail was a dragon! And he invited his friends to find us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did this all happen because we went back to General Krieg's place? Did we kill the entire city because we went back to General Krieg's place?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But think of the 4,000 gold we got! (laughs)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or maybe this was a long time coming and it just happened to time up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll find out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm hoping it's the first, I'm hoping it's the first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We shall see if all of these interests come to reveal themselves in the future--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That was frightening, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- for future episodes of Critical Role.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What did we do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You just massacred people. You just committed genocide.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a really weird feeling.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You destroyed your whole city, Matt.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The whole city, everyone's dead.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well done!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And Gilmore.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is Act Two of the game, of the video game that you're playing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Holy fuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So with that, folks, as it closes on 11 o'clock, we have to get ourselves a rest for the evening. We hope you've enjoyed tonight's game. I forgot to announce earlier because I was feeling all tense and-- yeah-- but we have a winner of our initial drawing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was a thing, wasn't it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So congratulations to you, buddy

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Someone won tonight! That's so nice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Someone won.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, well guys, have a wonderful night, thank you all for watching, we'll see you next Thursday.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to have an aneurysm.
